This vignette details the infrastructure requirements of sc9.

We strongly recommend that you use sc9 within a Docker environment.

## Infrastructure

- A MSSQL database

## Environmental variables

The following environmental variables must be available from within R. R only loads a limited amount of environmental variables by default, so you should make sure that these environmental variables are located in your `Renviron` file.

```
echo "SC9_AUTO=0" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_PATH='/input'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron

echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_ACCESS='config/anon/restr'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_DRIVER='ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_PORT='1433'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_USER='SA'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_PASSWORD='yourStrongPassword100'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_TRUSTED_CONNECTION='no'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_SERVER='dm-prod'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron

echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_SCHEMA_CONFIG='dbo'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_DB_CONFIG='sc_interactive_config'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron

echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_SCHEMA_ANON='dbo'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_DB_ANON='sc_interactive_anon'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron

echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_SCHEMA_RESTR='dbo'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
echo "SC9_DBCONFIG_DB_RESTR='sc_interactive_restr'" >> $R_HOME/etc/Renviron
```
